channel.title: I got in a fight
channel.description:
Well me and one of my best friends were hanging out at his house. We invited a few more friends over and we were just hanging out.
He got pissed over something about hell knows what and decks me in the left temple. I'm not saying i'm a huge guy because I am kind of small but I have wrestled since I was 5 and I am in pretty great shape. I hit him once then choked him until he passed out. I am home now and i just feel bad about it. Any ideas should i call him? or what?

item.title: I got in a fight
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:19, topic:245841”][quote author=maniown link=topic=322318.msg2548233#msg2548233 date=1227397166]

Sounds like you tried to kill him. I mean, why else would you choke someone for so long that they pass out?

I don’t think he went to kill him, he said he does wrestling. I take it by that he used a submission hold that is utilized in his wrestling, and there is a difference between a choke and a submission choke. A choke will probably kill someone after a while, whilst a submission choke is either a blood choke (pinching the arteries in the neck, i.e the Rear Naked Choke), Air choke (utilizing the trachea, crushing the windpipe, i.e the Gogoplata) or a Strangling choke, i.e the Peruvian Neck Tie. Whilst submission chokes are dangerous, they are actually pretty safe, depending on the type of choke, as in order of power (the quickest to make them fall asleep)
Blood > Air > Strangle

I put him in a cradle and locked his feet to hold him down. He was in an angry pissy mood. Im pretty sure he wanted to (hurt) me bad…

I don’t quite see how a cradle hold is a choke.

Okay you know how you hold the arm out and lock a leg up to the head? I pretty much did it cross face style. and brought it down to the neck to keep him down. More on his face than on his back.

It was my best friend… I wasn’t fighting to be a badass…

If he’s your best friend, why the fuck would he punch you out of no-where?
I’m sure he had reason to if he was sane.

He had alcohol… And he was pissed about hell knows what…
[/quote]

Alcohol does wonders! :D[/quote]

Yes indeed! It can do good and bad. Or! Good followed by bad!

Read full topic
